input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector (iPad Mini 4 2015 Version)

Item keywords:
Tempered Glass Screen Protector Fits Perfectly for the New Apple iPad Mini 4
Smooth and Touch Sensitive Glass Surface. No Air Bubble Application
Anti Shatter Glass, Ultra Thin and Tough, Real Premium Tempered Glass with anti chip 9H Hardness
Protects your iPad Mini 4 and Prevents LCD Scratches
HD Clear and Anti-fingerprint Anti Smudge oleophobic coating
Feels like the glass you are used to on your phone
Slim design doesn't add unnecessary bulk

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Protect your iPad Mini 4 with Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector. It's real premium tempered glass with anti chip 9H hardness. Smooth and touch sensitive glass surface. Oleophobic coating prevents fingerprints and smudges. Feels like the glass you are used to on your phone. Slim design doesn't add unnecessary bulk. Easy to follow application instructions.
input_text.Response B:
Introducing the Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector, a premium, anti-shatter, ultra-thin, and tough protective barrier for your prized iPad Mini 4 (2015 version). Crafted from real premium tempered glass with an industry-leading 9H hardness rating, this screen protector features a smooth and touch-sensitive glass surface, ensuring seamless interaction with your device while providing unparalleled protection against unsightly scratches and accidental damage.

Boasting an HD clear and anti-fingerprint anti-smudge oleophobic coating, this screen protector not only preserves the pristine appearance of your iPad Mini 4 but also ensures an unobstructed viewing experience. Its sleek and slim design, mere 0.3mm thickness, and precisely engineered cutouts for the iPad Mini 4's buttons, cameras, and speaker grilles, ensure a flawless fit that doesn't add unnecessary bulk to your device.

The Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector is crafted with the utmost attention to detail and precision engineering to provide maximum protection against the rigors of everyday use. With its anti-shatter design, this screen protector is built to withstand the unexpected, ensuring your iPad Mini 4 remains safe and secure.

Moreover, the tempered glass construction provides unparalleled durability and resistance to scratches, drops, and other forms of wear and tear, ensuring your iPad Mini 4's screen remains pristine for longer. The easy-to-apply, bubble-free installation process ensures a hassle-free experience, and the included dust removal stickers and cleaning cloth ensure a streak-free finish.

Invest in the Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector today and experience the unparalleled protection, clarity, and durability that only premium tempered glass can offer. Upgrade your iPad Mini 4's security and enhance its aesthetic appeal with this revolutionary screen protector.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
